Name: Re.poly
About the game: Important: The game is in development. Don't buy the game if you expect a full game or a lot of elements. The game will grow over time and if you want to helping out in this process, you can communicate with the dev at any time. What is this game about? ____________________________________________________ A dark age came upon the people of Aspira. The lord of the volcanic land broke the peace packt and implored a dark war. He swore to wipe out humanity, which he saw as a danger to his peers. He conjured the demon Kalis made all things man-made disappear. Even the human species seemed to be completely disappeared. Only one, the sorcerer Grindun, could escape that. To get humanity back from the dark catches you have to activate the restauration shrines he created and defeat the dark king to free Aspira. ____________________________________________________ What is possible? ____________________________________________________ Character customization - There are some options for customize your character like gender, hair and hair color Crafting - Create tools for gathering resources - Make equipment that protects you - Make different workbenches to get new manufacturing capabilities Economy and Agriculture - Grow plants to survive. - Buy animals from NPCs, breed them and sell their yields [In Progress] - Cook recipes to serve you [In Progress] {STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/breeding.jpg housing - Build your own home with a lot of possibilities to serve your needs - Decorate your home {STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/buildhouses.jpg Play with friends - You can Host a game to play with 4 of your friends - You can play online on the official server (50 players possible) Raid other players or play together - You have the possibility to raid other bases or play together ____________________________________________________
